text: I feel like this game shouldn't have such an amazing soundtrack, but it does. It's easily one of my favorites of the year and is packed with 200+ tracks. It's mind blowing, really. This is basically a mix of Tomodachi Life and a classic turn based RPG featuring Miis which I never really liked, but the music is so good that I would gladly pick it up and play through it.

text:
I came here from track #1 and it took me 45 days to go through your lists (was taking some detours listening to game OSTs that I discovered thanks to you). Thank you for all the uploads, here's to another 2081 songs (or more, of course).

Now if you'll excuse me, I'm gonna go back and listen to them all over again.

text:
I finally caught up with the list! A channel from a single person turned into a mission worthy of all gamers! Thank you SD. It's been a journey through a lot of different styles and feeling that you're the weird one because you spend so much time listening to vgm. 
That been said, I highly recommend Mr. Bree+ soundtrack.
